Key Match Events: South Africa won by 3 wickets (with 5 balls remaining) (DLS method)
Roston Chase took 3 wickets for 12 runs
Kyle Mayers and Roston Chase had an 81-run stand
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa have an undefeated streak of six matches
South Africa have survived a rain-reduced match and successfully chased a tricky target
South Africa have topped their Super Eight group
South Africa are likely to avoid India in the final four
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's spinners took 5 for 79 in 12 overs
West Indies faced 57 dot balls in their innings
South Africa dropped four catches during the match
Others: Aiden Markram took the new ball in this match and bowled himself for a full quota of four overs
Kagiso Rabada had the latest he has ever bowled in this format
Heinrich Klaasen provided the game-changing passage of play when he took on Gudakesh Motie and broke the back of the chase
